For children not going on the Cambodia Trip
Mr Lambros and Mr Hickman are currently planning an action-packed activities week in mid June for those Year 6 children not going to Cambodia and staying in school. A brief outline of the week’s events is attached for your information.
It would be enormously helpful to know if you intend on sending your child into school that week to enable us to determine numbers so we can plan in detail for the various activities. Throughout the week there will be on-going project work for the children based on a trip to Frim, as well as work with the Zo Learning Centre (Kepong) for refugee children from Myanmar. An outline of the week's events is below.
